parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs. The value of this parameter must be the same as the application name specified in the ingest URL. Otherwise, the configuration does not take effect.

parameters.name: DstUrl
parameters.description: The third-party URL to which the live stream is relayed.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the live stream.
